summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pati Devta Quiz flow. All 14 specified features working perfectly including landing page navigation, quiz instructions, 15 questions with progress tracking, result calculation with backend storage, and navigation controls.
passed_tests: Landing page CTA button 'LETS FIND OUT' navigates to /quiz route
Quiz instructions page displays 4 instructions correctly
Name input field validates and shows error 'Pehle apna naam daalo!' when empty
'SHURU KARO' button starts quiz after name entered
Question 1 displays with progress bar showing 1/15
HAAN (Yes) button works and advances to next question
NA (No) button works and advances to next question
Progress bar updates correctly through all 15 questions (1/15 to 15/15)
After question 15, result page displays automatically
Result page shows score percentage (47%), rating (THEEK-THAAK üòê), and HAAN/NA counts (7/8)
Backend API POST /api/quiz/submit stores results correctly with proper score calculation
Backend API GET /api/quiz/results returns stored results
Backend API GET /api/quiz/result/{id} retrieves specific results
Backend API handles invalid IDs with 404 error
'Dobara Khelo' button resets quiz and navigates to instructions
'Home' button navigates back to landing page
All 15 quiz questions from quizQuestions.js display correctly
Session storage properly manages user name and answers
Score calculation algorithm works correctly (80% for 12/15 yes answers = MAHARAJ rating)
